item.title: Rep Moulton says fellow Dems 'privately' agree with his criticism of party

item.description: Pennsylvania Democratic Sen. John K. Fetterman talked to Fox News Digital about the Casey-McCormick race now headed for automatic recount.

item.title: Elon Musk blasts John Bolton as 'staggeringly dumb warmonger' after criticism of Trump AG pick Matt Gaetz
item.description: Elon Musk called John Bolton "a staggeringly dumb warmonger" and suggested that Bolton's opposition to someone is "a great sign!"

item.title: Meet Pete Hegseth: The 'recovering neocon' and Pentagon critic who's been tapped for Defense secretary
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump sent shock waves through the national security establishment when he nominated Pete Hegseth for Defense secretary.
